features: Persil Free and Sensitive laundry soap is gentle on skin: dye-free, perfume-free and dermatologist tested
Get exceptionally clean clothes without dyes and perfumes that can aggravate skin sensitivities
Great for everyday laundry, even activewear, and to fight tough stains
Persil laundry detergents have been optimized for great performance in all types of machines, including high efficiency (HE) washers and clean effectively in cold water
This concentrated formula delivers 2X more cleaning power in every drop vs our standard Persil Free and Sensitive detergent, so you don’t have to use as much to get a gentle, deep clean
body.description: For those with sensitive skin, Persil Power-Liquid Free and Sensitive detergent gives you the cleaning power of our Original detergent in a hypoallergenic formula. It's 100% dye-free and perfume-free and dermatologist-tested. And it's formulated to deliver an exceptional deep clean, which makes it great for everyday laundry and to help fight tough stains. With Free and Sensitive Persil laundry detergent, you'll get exceptionally clean clothes without dyes and perfumes that can aggravate skin sensitivities. While gentle on skin, Persil Power-Liquid Free and Sensitive remains tough on stains so you still get an exceptional deep clean. This concentrated formula delivers 2X more cleaning power in every drop vs our standard Persil Free and Sensitive detergent, so you don’t have to use as much to get a gentle, deep clean. Persil Power-Liquid laundry detergent works in all washing machines, including high efficiency (HE) washers and cleans effectively in cold water. This package includes one 82.5-fluid-ounce bottle of Persil ProClean Free and Sensitive 2X concentrated liquid laundry detergent, enough for 110 regular loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HE Compatible Persil Proclean laundry detergents have been optimized for great performance in all types of machines, including HE. With a low suds, clean rinse formula, Persil Proclean laundry detergents help your brights stay bright and your whites stay white. Power-Liquid Persil Power-Liquid detergent is formulated to deliver a deep clean for life's messy moments and a powerful freshness that last long after wash. Proclean DISCS Each pre-measured DISCS detergent capsule combines powerful stain removal, long-lasting freshness, fiber care, and provides a deep clean. Deep Clean The Persil formula contains stainfighting enzymes specially designed to break down stains and deliver an exceptional deep clean. So when stains go deep, Persil detergent goes deeper.

Persil Free and Sensitive 2X Laundry Detergent Persil Original 2X Laundry Deterget Persil Intense Fresh 2X Laundry Deterget Persil OXI Power 2X Laundry Deterget Persil Original DISCS Laundry Pacs Persil OXI Power DISCS Laundry Pacs Key Benefit 100% Dye and Perfume Free Deep Clean of Visible and Invisible Dirt Extremely Fresh Scent Oxi Power Technology Deep Clean of Visible and Invisible Dirt Oxi Power Technology

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin. I react to every laundry detergent I have tried. I also react to perfumes in detergent and this one does not have a scent. So, I finally decided to try this expensive brand. I am thrilled with it with one exception….I can’t easily see the lines indicating the product measurements. The red cap makes it difficult to see when the product reaches whichever amount you need. I resolved that by measuring and getting an equivalent number of tablespoons. So now I just measure two tablespoons into the washer for level one loads and rinse the tablespoon with water directly into the machine. (Majority of loads, I need level one for my washing loads.) ADVANTAGES: It washes my clothes absolutely perfectly. No scent, no irritation to my skin. Clothes smell refreshed without an artificial scent. Oh, I recently bought a new Speed Queen washer. The previously used detergents left a residue around the tub. This marvelous detergent DID NOT leave ant residue on the washing tub. Fantastic product. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly a Scent/Odor Free Great Cleaning Laundry Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Persil is a scent free detergent that cleans clothing well. We use it for both dark and light colors and have great results. The small amount you need to effectively clean is also wonderful as both storage and ordering is simple. We also have dogs that enjoy the outdoors giving our laundry a work out and Persil continually gives us clean and scent/odor free clothing. If you’re looking for a scent free laundry detergent that doesn’t irritate skin while still doing a great job on cleaning, Persil fits the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective laundry detergent that works with cold washes leaving clothes fragrance free and clean
reviews.reviewText: Persil by far one of the best laundry detergents out there. I have tried their other products known for their strong scents, and wanted one without. This one seemed the best value for its size and also worked with cold washes. It also brightens whites and will eliminate odors.I tried out several loads with varying temperatures and fabrics. I found that this detergent does work best with hot washes over cold, but will do fine with cold washes so long as the clothes aren't too dirty. This can be deal breaker though if you are only looking to wash with cold since I found it actually did a poor job with too dirty clothes. On hot the detergent works great, amazing, and does so much it's outstanding. White towels were brighten and whiten. Black clothing also seemed to be restored and didn't appear as faded. Clothes that have sickly sweet smell from buildup of softener and other detergent smells were eliminated. Skin didn't react as well. The bottle being smaller and more concentrated also makes this detergent more portable and easier to handle. Easy to pour and measure along with a cap that twists back into place for added security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best laundry detergent on the market
reviews.reviewText: This is the highest quality detergent that I've ever found and is also fragrance-free, safe for allergies. I usually don't even need to pre-treat to get out marks and stains. Outstanding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product Quality is good. The delivery time was months.
reviews.reviewText: Product Quality is good.The delivery time was months.My e-mail system keeps information for 3 months.I know I ordered this sometime in the distance past. But I can't find the order in my e-mail system.I still need it, so I will keep it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ultra concentrated so less packaging.Impressed! Clean clothes don’t need to smell “fragranced”.Purchased this brand at a local store. The one I bought was a blue liquid and has a strong scent. My husband likes the blue one. I prefer fragrance-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I love this detergent. I am very sensitive. No issues with this one. Cleans great. I have a hard time finding in the store. So happy I can get on Amazon. Best detergent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars detergent was not sealed properly and some spilled out

reviews.reviewText: I can not find this in stores anywhere! I have extremely sensitive skin..especially in the winter. This is the best laundry detergent I have used. No itching,rashes or redness. Tough on stains and you clothes come out smelling clean. Highly recommend .

reviews.reviewTitle: Happy with my new laundry detergent!
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Better than previous brands I used. Works well for my sensitive skin and nose.
Love the fragrance free and sensitive option. Wish this was available in the discs but glad to have liquid option.
Expensive but gentle on skin and does a better cleaning job than Tide Free & Gentle.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the two detergents I will buy.
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, this is a fantastic detergent very on par with the tide hygienic clean which is my other go to detergent. However, I went to purchase this today. November 28, 2023, and the only only seller available is charging $45 Canadian for one bottle. Persil, you need to get your business together and actually operate your store front directly. Canadian consumers do not want to pay these outrageous prices and your unscented detergent is NOT available in Canadian grocery stores. I have never been able to find it. Nonetheless, no store should be permitted to sell this for $45 CDN on amazon.ca.
